price: Maze yakirwa mu Bwami bw’ijuru abwirwa ati: “Kaze, niwinjire mu Bwami bw’ijuru”. Araheza avuga ari mu nema zo mu Bwami bw’ijuru ati: “Ese iyo abantu banje bamenya iherezo ryanje ryiza;
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
